Class Swipe

Class defined in: src/gestures/swipe.js:4

triggers swipe events when the end velocity is above the threshold for best usage, set preventDefault (on the drag gesture) to true

 hammertime.on("dragleft swipeleft", function(ev) {
   console.log(ev);
   ev.gesture.preventDefault();
 });
